name: Flower Veil
summary: Prevents non-volatile (which means burn, poison, sleep, paralysis, and frozen) statuses from lowering the stats of all Grass-type Pokémon on the user's side.
viability: In Double and Triples, this prevents Grass-type physical attackers from having their Attack dropped due to burn and Speed lowered due to paralysis. In singles, this is rather useless, but in Doubles/Triples Flower Gift is highly recommended.
